query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.progress, COUNT(tc.id) as checklist_count
FROM tasks t
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON t.id = tc.taskId
WHERE t.name = 'งานฐานราก'
GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.progress;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33MDJNP9oQHNu88.9be2e504806b --database XGUfRkFw3wTJbZrCqsFJBu --execute SELECT t.id, t.name, t.progress, COUNT(tc.id) as checklist_count
FROM tasks t
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON t.id = tc.taskId
WHERE t.name = 'งานฐานราก'
GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.progress;
